product.title: Yuck Embroidered Patch
product.description: Ew. Gross. Nope. This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. Size: 3" Color: White
product.descriptionHtml:
Ew. Gross. Nope. 

This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

Size: 3"

Color: White
